text: Isrāīlī fauj bhī laṛne ke lie jamā huī. Khāne-pīne kī ashyā kā band-o-bast kiyā gayā, aur wuh dushman se laṛne ke lie nikle. Jab wahāṅ pahuṅche to unhoṅ ne apne ḳhaimoṅ ko do jaghoṅ par lagāyā. Yih do guroh Shām kī wasī fauj ke muqābale meṅ bakriyoṅ ke do chhoṭe rewaṛoṅ jaise lag rahe the, kyoṅki pūrā maidān Shām ke faujiyoṅ se bharā thā.
